name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Missoulian]
description: Hides the Missoulian's header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.) Removes ads, comments, social media buttons, syndicated content, and other clutter.
additional_info:
The thin vertical strips at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, footer, and sidebar. Mouse over them to restore the element. 

http://missoulian.com/
